page.title: 01THE HOLTON AREA- GENERAL
page.content: This block hereafter referred to as the Holton Area, comprises fairly low lying land West of the Lincolnshire Wolds and just south of the small Market town of Market Rasen. It is predominantly an agricultural area but has several businesses taking a low profile utilising open spaces especially on the airfield. There are 3 villages, Wickenby, Holton and Lissington. Holton is usually referred to as Holton cum Beckering but Beckering is just South of this block. The villages follow the lines of the roads and are small having developed little over the years. The inhabitants rely on Market Rasen, Wragby and Lincoln for their amenities. The decline in public transport makes the area less attractive to those unconnected with agriculture or without cars.
